overview.vibe/brand: not specified (music-related, but not a traditional record store)

history.notable_history: Cornerstone Community Church was founded by Bill Curry and some students from Philadelphia College of Bible. They started a Thursday night ministry for teenagers and later added a children's ministry. The church has been serving the community for over 40 years.

staff.owner_info: Bill Curry is the lead pastor, but no other staff information is provided

unique_features.cafe: yes (mentioned as part of the church's activities)
unique_features.other: Hewitt Center and playground/picnic grove on site

community_role.engagement: serves the local community through various ministries and outreach programs
community_role.mission: to be the hands and feet of Jesus Christ to the community
